item.title: VMware vRealize SaltStack Config as a Windows Server Admin - Part 3
item.description: Part 3: How to use SaltStack Config with Windows Server and PowerShell The next steps on my journey with **VMware vRealize SaltStack Config** as a **Windows Server Admin** will be beacons and reactors.
